biotools.summary: aPRBind is a convolutional neural network (CNN)-based ab-initio method for RNA-binding residue prediction. aPRBind is trained with sequence features and structural ones (particularly including residue dynamics information and residue-nucleotide propensity developed by us) that are extracted from the predicted structures by I-TASSER

bioschemas.name: aPRBind
bioschemas.summary: aPRBind is a convolutional neural network (CNN)-based ab-initio method for RNA-binding residue prediction. aPRBind is trained with sequence features and structural ones (particularly including residue dynamics information and residue-nucleotide propensity developed by us) that are extracted from the predicted structures by I-TASSER
